channel.title: Freedoom Scoops Feed
channel.description: The latest news from Freedoom Scoops

item.title: 2019-10-22: Freedoom Scoops
item.description:
> General <p/> The HTML documentation (eg, +NEWS+ and +README+ files) are generated with a style based on _Freedoom Scoops_’s own website, rather than the default AsciiDoc styling. <p/> _Phase 2_’s internal DEMO1 has been replaced, thanks to some odd vanilla quirks that could cause it to desync in some (but not all) conditions. <p/>
> Levels <p/> The sailor monster type is formally banished from _Freedoom Scoops_’s own levels, and remaining uses of it were removed. <p/>
> Manual <p/> Incongruities between the actual game and manual have been fixed. <p/>
> Build system <p/> The `make install` targets have been consolidated to behave more similarly to how the pre-built zip distributions are: a split between _FreeDM_ and _Phase 1+2_, rather than installing each of the tree IWADs independently (and thus getting their own +/usr/share/doc+ directories, for instance). <p/>
